item.title: 1/10/2024 – Effective Prayer and Unity
item.description: Minister Laverne Oysterman message entitled, “Effective Prayer and Unity”. God is going to level the playing field for you, speedily and expeditiously!
item.itunes:author: Minister Lavern Oysterman

item.title: 1/14/2024 – I Know This Is Gonna Turn
item.description: Minister Sherri Ann Abbott message entitled, “I Know This Is Gonna Turn”. Stand believing that God has already turned that situation around for you and your family and loved ones.
item.itunes:author: Sherri Ann Abbott

item.title: 01/07/2024 – Prayer That Changes Things – Part 4
item.description:
Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon message entitled, “Prayer That Changes Things”
Part 4″. God is going to work speedily. Become a consistent, persistent prayer warrior in the Kingdom of God.
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 01-03-2024 – 2024 The Year of Acceleration and Demonstration – Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. delivers a sermon discussing Bishop Keith Butler’s message to the Church for the year 2024.
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 10/15/2023 – Israel
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon explains how modern day events impacting Israel is part of bible Prophecy.
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 8/2/2020 – The Word, The Name and The Blood
item.description: Minister Sherri Ann Abbott message entitled, “The Word, The Name and The Blood”. Jesus erased everything we once were in Adam.
item.itunes:author: Sherri Ann Abbott

item.title: 8/2/2020 – The Word, The Name and The Blood
item.description: 8/2/2020 – The Word, The Name and The Blood
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 8/5/2018 – Turn Back, “Give God Praise!”
item.description: Minister Sharon Walker, message is entitled, “Turn Back, Give God Praise”.
item.itunes:author: Minister Sharon Walker

item.title: 8/1/2018 – Accept the Word as the Truth!
item.description: Minister Sharon Walker, message is entitled, “Accept the Word as the Truth!”
item.itunes:author: Minister Sharon Walker

item.title: 7/29/2018 – Focus on the Family
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon Message entitled, “Focus on the Family”. God is very adamant about family, learn the importance of a Godly family. Make Jesus the center of your family.
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 7/25/2018 – Courage and Encouragement (Series – Part 1)
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon message entitled, “Courage and Encouragement!” Learn about some of things God did with the great heroes in the Bible.
item.itunes:author: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr.

item.title: 7/18/2018 – A New Thing!
item.description: Minister Sherri Abbott, Message is entitled, “A New Thing!” Experience God in a fresh and a new way. God will rekindle the fire on the inside of you. Allow God to minister to you according to your specific situation.
item.itunes:author: Sherri Ann Abbott

item.title: 7/15/2018 – Are You Ready?
item.description: Evangelist Marie Diggs, Message is entitled, “Are You Ready?” Are you ready to fulfill your God-Ordained assignment?
item.itunes:author: rliburd

item.title: 7/11/2018 – Dominate! (Series – Part 2)
item.description: Evangelist Marie Diggs, Sermon Series entitled, “Dominate!” God’s original plan for mankind, was for us to DOMINATE! We were given authority and created in the image of God.
item.itunes:author: Maria Heard

item.title: 7/8/2018 – Dominate! (Series – Part 1)
item.description: Evangelist Marie Diggs, Sermon Series entitled, “Dominate!” God’s original plan for mankind, was for us to DOMINATE! We were given authority and created in the image of God.
item.itunes:author: rliburd

item.title: 7/1/2018 – Understanding the End Times! (Series – Part 7)
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon Series entitled, “Understanding the End Times!” This Series is a precursor before we get to the Book of Revelations. We are witnessing how the World is lining up with Bible right before our eyes! Open your heart to the Word of God and your eyes to what is happening!
item.itunes:author: rliburd

item.title: 6/20/2018 – Good and Perfect Gifts Come from God! (Series – Part 1)
item.description: Pastor Ronald D. Walker, Jr. Sermon series entitled, “Good and Perfect Gifts Come from God!” Pastor Walker teaches about how God the Father cannot be tempted with evil nor tempt any man with evil.
item.itunes:author: rliburd

item.title: 6/17/2018 – Understanding the End Times! (Series – Part 5)

item.title: 6/13/2018 – The Poison of Unforgiveness!
item.description: Minister Sherri Abbott message is entitled, “The Poison of Unforgiveness!” Learn how God’s Word cleanses us from the inside out. The enemy wants to destroy you through unforgiveness. But Jesus came so you can walk in total liberty in every area of your life!
item.itunes:author: rliburd
